summary: Feature request to allow Client and Activity-only Workers to accept pre-loaded DataConverter instances instead of requiring paths, reducing unnecessary build process complexity for non-Workflow components.
userImpact: Users must unnecessarily complicate build processes for non-Workflow components due to path-based DataConverter requirements.
rootCause: Historical design decision to require paths for consistency with Workflow Worker behavior, which becomes counter-productive when workflow and client code are in separate deployment units.
proposedFix: Make Client and Activity-only Workers accept pre-loaded DataConverter instances directly instead of requiring paths.
workaround: Workaround using Worker.options.loadedDataConverter to extract and reconfigure converters after worker creation.
keyQuote: By imposing consistency, we are forcing users to adapt and complexify the build process of all non-Workflow Worker components without no real reason to do so.
